Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The mekonari are hosting argon soldiers near Dragonfall.

Raid their base around Raven Altar and kill mekonari {@LinkCreature:56#7#templars} and {@LinkCreature:56#8#dedicants}, and {@LinkCreature:56#23#kalash avengers}. Report to Emya in Dragonfall when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
